source.sqlReaderQuery: select max(ModifiedDate) as new_watermark from SalesLT.ProductCategory

sqlReaderQuery.value: select * from SalesLT.ProductCategory where ModifiedDate > '@{activity('Lookup_OldWaterMark').output.firstRow.watermark}' and ModifiedDate <= '@{activity('Lookup_NewWaterMark').output.firstRow.new_watermark}'

source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT COUNT(*) AS RecordCount FROM dbo.ProductCategory_stg;

select ProductCategoryID, ParentProductCategoryID, Name, RowGUID from dbo.ProductCategory where ModifiedDate > '@{pipeline().parameters.OldWaterMarkActivity}'
